title: Add Climate Tech as Priority Category
description: Increase funding allocation for climate technology grants from 15% to 25% of total budget.

title: New Grant Committee Members
description: Add three new domain experts to the grant approval committee to improve diversity of expertise.

title: Increase Grant Size Cap
description: Raise maximum grant amount from $75,000 to $100,000 for high-impact projects.

title: Simplify Application Process
description: Streamline the application form and reduce required documentation for initial submissions.

title: Add Quarterly Progress Reports
description: Require quarterly updates from grant recipients to ensure funds are used effectively.
